alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Hancock; Seneca; Wyandot (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 1:50AM EDT until August 24 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM EDT FOR WESTERN SENECA...WYANDOT...CRAWFORD AND EASTERN HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 150 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Arcadia to near Upper Sandusky to 6 miles southwest of Bucyrus, moving southwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Fostoria, Bucyrus, Upper Sandusky, Galion, Crestline, Forest, Sycamore, Arcadia, Vanlue, New Riegel, Carey, Benton, Nevada, Wharton, North Robinson, Harpster, Kirby, Bascom, Oceola and Sulpher Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
